properties.areaDesc: Whitfield, GA; Murray, GA; Gordon, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:23AM EST until February 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Gordon...Murray and
Whitfield Counties

Chattooga River near Summerville affecting Chattooga County

Oostanaula River near Resaca affecting Floyd and Gordon Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Conasauga River near Tilton.
* From this afternoon until late Sunday night.
* At 9 AM Thursday the stage was 15.2 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue
to rise to near 23.3 feet by Friday evening. The river will fall
below flood stage by Sunday evening.
* At 24 feet...Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding
expands into the woodlands...fields and pastures along the river
upstream and downstream from the Brackett Ridge Road bridge.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
